code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{CartContext}from'../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Shop(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[q,setQ]=useState('');const{add}=useContext(CartContext);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/products').then(r=>setProducts(r.data)).catch(()=>{});},[]);const filtered=products.filter(p=>p.title.toLowerCase().includes(q.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"site-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:["Komal's ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:'#d4a373'},children:"Handmade"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/",children:"Home"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{style:{padding:'30px 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Search products",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value),style:{padding:8,margin:'10px 0',width:'100%'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:filtered.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:p.images&&p.images[0],alt:p.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:p.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"small",children:["\u20B9",p.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:10},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>add(p),children:"Add to cart"})})]},p._id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["\xA9 ",new Date().getFullYear()," Komal's Handmade"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"made-by",children:"Made with \u2728 Komal Kale"})]})]});}
